name: Peanut Butter Cup Milkshake
description: Smooth peanut butter and butter pecan ice cream create layers of nutty flavor in this sweet, salty take on the classic peanut butter cup.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups chocolate ice cream, such as Häagen-Dazs
1 1/2 cups butter pecan ice cream, such as Häagen-Dazs

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chocolate ice cream, butter pecan ice cream, peanut butter, milk, and salt in a blender. Pulse a few times on high to begin breaking up the ice cream. Blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds.
Divide into two glasses and top with whipped cream if desired. Serve immediately.
